pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the President of Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with the President of Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta, on the margins of the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in London, United Kingdom.

Prime Minister Trudeau and President Kenyatta discussed the importance of generating economic growth that benefits everyone, and the potential for deepening commercial ties between Canada and Kenya.  

Prime Minister Trudeau acknowledged the important contribution of Kenya to peace and security in Africa.   

The two leaders discussed opportunities to work together to improve the health of the world’s oceans, a priority issue at the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting and for Canada’s G7 Presidency.
